SEARCH

Package cdx.opencdx.communications.service

package cdx.opencdx.communications.service
This is the Service Interface package, designed specifically for defining Spring service interfaces.

The files housed within this package are typically of the Interface type. The corresponding implementations of these interfaces are located in the adjoining 'impl' package.

Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    cdx.opencdx.communications
    OpenCDX Communication Microservice plays a pivotal role in enabling communication via email and SMS.
    cdx.opencdx.communications.service.impl
    This package is dedicated to the concrete implementation of Spring Service Interfaces.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    OpenCDXCDCMessageService
    Interface for sending CDC (Change Data Capture) notifications.
    OpenCDXCommunicationEmailService
    Represents a service for communicating with OpenCDX via email.
    OpenCDXCommunicationSmsService
    Interface for the OpenCDXCommunicationSmsService
    OpenCDXEmailService
    Interface for sending emails using OpenCDXEmailService.
    OpenCDXHTMLProcessor
    An interface for processing a template of HTML with variable substitution to generate HTML with fully substitute
    OpenCDXNotificationService
    Interface for the OpenCDXNotificationService
    OpenCDXSMSService
    Interface to the OpenCDX SMS service.
